description:
Chocolate and mint is one of those flavour combinations that just works. Each square of rich 72% dark chocolate is filled to perfection with refreshing mint fondant, making every bite as good as the last.

  • Ingredients: dark chocolate [cocoa mass, sugar, emulsifier (soy lecithin), vanilla flavour]; peppermint fondant 34%* (sugar,water, glucose, peppermint oil). Chocolate contains 72% cocoa solids minimum
  • Allergens, may contain: milk, peanuts, tree nuts and gluten
  • A family legacy, Whittaker’s is New Zealand’s finest chocolate and has been since 1896
  • Based on rich Ghanian cocoa pods that are sun-dried to perfection before processing in small batches in Porirua New Zealand
  • Rainforest alliance certified
name: Whittaker's Ghana Peppermint Chocolate
